info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 5:13PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN WESTCHESTER COUNTY THROUGH 600 PM EDT... At 513 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dobbs Ferry, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Yonkers, White Plains, Port Chester, Harrison, Scarsdale, Bronxville, Eastchester, Rye Brook, Hastings-on-Hudson, Greenville, Tuckahoe, Hartsdale, and Ardsley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
